cohortDescription: "This cohort contain all patients who were in the database on Janurary the 1st in 2017
column3: 2018 or 2019.  Their index date is the earliest 1st January between 2017-2019 they were in the database"

cohortDescription: "This cohort contains all patients who had one or more visits during 2017
column3: 2018 and 2019.  Their index date is a randomly selected visit between 2017-2019"

cohortDescription: "This cohort contain all patients who had a flu vaccine recorded during 2017
column3: 2018 or 2019.  Their index date is the earliest flu vaccine date between 2017-2019"
